main event: An object was detected on radar at Thule AB, Greenland, on 6 Oct 1960, moving in a straight line and then disappearing before reappearing at different angles.
interesting points: The object was at 20 miles elevation and was tracked for a total of 4 minutes,The sightings involved 4 or 5 closures of the object, The object was originally reported as a UFO according to AF regulations, The observations noted unusual occurrences of light in the sky, There were confirmed sightings by military personnel and others working in the area.
witness description: employees from General Electric and RCA on the BVEWS project
